== Kakkanad (CT) (628007) ==

Kakkanad (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 17.54 sq. km. and harbouring 6422 households with total population of 25531 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 225 km. Male population is 12750 and female population is 12781. Scheduled Caste population is 4010 and Scheduled Tribes population is 112. Census Location Code of the town is 628007<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 5 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 5 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam town at a distance of 5 km.
